sentence.Network_en: So far we have had ringing declarations, but only limited action.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前，我们已经发表了一些有力的声明，但只采取了有限的行动。

sentence.Network_en: Nerve cells have limited ability to regenerate if destroyed.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果受到损伤，神经细胞再造的能力有限。

sentence.Network_en: Entry to this prize draw is limited to UK residents.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次抽奖只限英国公民参加。

英语单词立体记忆 ... preliminary school 小学 → limitation 限制，局限 → limited 有限的.

entry.def: Something that is limited is not very great in amount, range, or degree.

example.ex: They may only have a limited amount of time to get their points across...
example.tran: 他们可能只有有限的时间来说明自己的意思。

example.ex: Shops have a very limited selection.
example.tran: 商店里的选择非常有限。

entry.def: A limited company is one whose owners are legally responsible for only a part of any money that it may owe if it goes bankrupt.

example.ex: They had plans to turn the club into a limited company...
example.tran: 他们计划将这个俱乐部变为一家股份有限公司。

example.ex: He is the founder of International Sports Management Limited.
example.tran: 他是国际体育管理有限公司的创始人。

means.word_mean: 2. subject to limits or subjected to limits
6. having a specific function or scope;

sentences.sentence: "a special (or specific) role in the mission"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常在动词后,"有……的,被……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通常的,习惯的,按照风俗习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accustom使习惯+ed有……的,被……的→通常的,习惯的
ally同盟者+ed有……的,被……的→allied联合的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕耘的,有教养的,栽植的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cultivate耕耘,栽植+ed有……的,被……的→cultivated耕耘的
harden变硬+ed有……的,被……的→adj.变硬的,坚毅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受伤的,受损害的,受委屈的
感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest兴趣,关心+ed有……的,被……的→adj.感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
limit限制+ed有……的,被……的→adj.有限的,被限制的
note注意到+ed有……的,被……的→被注意的→著名的
pack打包+ed有……的,被……的→adj.充满……的,塞满了……的
repeat重复,反复+ed有……的,被……的→adj.重复的,再三的
suppose猜想,推测+ed有……的,被……的→adj.假定的,假像的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wick+ed有……的,被……的→adj.坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
fix固定+ed有……的,被……的→adj.固定的,确定的

Sentence.sentence: They're also expensive, especially when you factor in the average college student's limited budget, typically costing hundreds of dollars every semester.
Sure, in the past electric vehicles have their problems, namely, a limited driving range, and very few recharging points, which limited their use.
Sure, in the past electric vehicles have their problems, namely, a limited driving range, and very few recharging points, which limited their use.
People nowadays seem to have the sense that their time has become more limited.
If families do not know English or have limited English skills themselves, how can they communicate in English
One free social networking website turned out to successful because it limited each posting to one hundred and forty characters.

jushi.english: He seems to have only a limited intelligence.
Only a limited number of places is available.
jushi.chinese: 只有少数地方可供使用。
